EmailTemplate.subject: Important Action - Submitted Application Incomplete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Thank you for submitting an application to work on our 2015 NCS programmes.
Unfortunately, due to a technical error your application form has not uploaded completely to our system.
What do I need to do now?
We would appreciate it if you would do the following
Log into the Staffing Website and click on 'My Application'.
Review your application and complete all the missing fields.
You can update fields which you have already completed (should you wish to). You will not be able to amend any files you have uploaded so if you wish to change this you will need to email me the files using the contact details below.
Click here to update your application https://staffing.the-challenge.org/secure/ApplicationForm.aspx#/edit/3
Once you have fully reviewed your application and are happy with the content, press ‘submit’. This is the last time you will be able to edit your application.
What happens after I re-submit?
After resubmission we will review your entire application (resubmitted version only). You will be notified of the outcome of your application within two weeks of resubmitting.
If you have any questions please contact me, quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
We would like to apologise for any inconvenience caused and we look forward to seeing your application soon.
The Challenge
{!Contact.OwnerFullName}
{!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Email Reference: CR 3.5
